Story :

Sanit owns a delicious noodle diner. Actually, he still has a dream to be a boxer since he was a little boy, but he never wins any opponents. When Sab, one of his frequent customer, and a former boxer, offers himself to be the trainer, the courage to win in the boxing ring is not too far. While the training is going very well, his love life becomes in trouble when his girlfriend\&#039;s father isn\&#039;t too fond of him. Then, this time, Sanit will not only fight for his victory, but also for his love.
